text: Think Positively, Network Well, Exercise Daily, Eat Healthy, Work Hard, Stay Strong, Build Faith, Worry Less, Read More, Be Happy, Volunteer Freely, Relax Often, Love Always, Live Forever
Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

text: The Best Way to Predict the Future is to Create it.
author: Peter Drucker & Abraham Lincoln

text: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the World are the ones who do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: By doing nothing, you become nothing.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles Rozell Swindoll

text: Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony.
author: Douglas Coupland, Shampoo Planet

text: People May Hear Your Words, But They Feel Your Attitude
author: John Calvin Maxwell

text: Your life today is a result of your thinking yesterday. Your life tomorrow will be determined by what you think today.
author: John Calvin Maxwell

text: The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
author: Paulo Coelho

text: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit, wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
author: Miles Kington

text: When you take risks, you learn that there will be times when you succeed, and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

text: Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
author: Michael Jordan

text: If you ever think about giving up, remember why you held on for so long.
author: Hayley Williams

text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston Churchill
